sourcesContent:
export const restaurants = [
  {
    id: '1',
    name: 'Pizza Express',
    description: 'Las mejores pizzas artesanales con ingredientes frescos',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1513104890138-7c749659a591?w=400',
    rating: 4.5,
    deliveryTime: '25-35 min',
    deliveryFee: 2.50,
    minimumOrder: 15.00,
    cuisine: 'Italiana',
    address: 'Calle Principal 123',
    phone: '+1 123 456 789',
    isOpen: true,
    categories: ['Pizza', 'Pasta', 'Ensaladas'],
    allergens: ['Gluten', 'Lactosa', 'Huevos'],
  },
  {
    id: '2',
    name: 'Burger House',
    description: 'Hamburguesas gourmet con carne 100% de res',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1571091718767-18b5b1457add?w=400',
    rating: 4.3,
    deliveryTime: '20-30 min',
    deliveryFee: 1.99,
    minimumOrder: 12.00,
    cuisine: 'Americana',
    address: 'Avenida Central 456',
    phone: '+1 987 654 321',
    isOpen: true,
    categories: ['Hamburguesas', 'Papas', 'Bebidas'],
    allergens: ['Gluten', 'Lactosa', 'Mostaza'],
  },
  {
    id: '3',
    name: 'Sushi Master',
    description: 'Sushi fresco y aut√©ntico preparado por expertos',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1579584425555-c3ce17fd4351?w=400',
    rating: 4.7,
    deliveryTime: '30-45 min',
    deliveryFee: 3.50,
    minimumOrder: 20.00,
    cuisine: 'Japonesa',
    address: 'Plaza Mayor 789',
    phone: '+1 555 123 456',

    allergens: ['Pescado', 'Soya', 'Gluten'],
  },
  {
    id: '4',

    description: 'Tacos mexicanos aut√©nticos con sabores tradicionales',

    rating: 4.2,
    deliveryTime: '15-25 min',

    minimumOrder: 10.00,
    cuisine: 'Mexicana',
    address: 'Calle del Sol 321',
    phone: '+1 777 888 999',
    isOpen: true,
    categories: ['Tacos', 'Quesadillas', 'Bebidas'],
    allergens: ['Gluten', 'Lactosa'],
  },
  {
    id: '5',
    name: 'Veggie Garden',
    description: 'Comida vegetariana y vegana saludable y deliciosa',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1540420773420-3366772f4999?w=400',
    rating: 4.6,
    deliveryTime: '25-35 min',
    deliveryFee: 2.00,
    minimumOrder: 18.00,
    cuisine: 'Vegetariana',
    address: 'Calle Verde 654',
    phone: '+1 111 222 333',
    isOpen: true,
    categories: ['Ensaladas', 'Bowl', 'Smoothies'],
    allergens: ['Frutos secos', 'Soya'],
  },
];

export const products = {

    {
